H3.text: who was the first dictator of the soviet union. Joseph Stalin

A4.text: Volkogonov believed that whereas Lenin established a 'dictatorship of the Party', it would only be under Stalin that the Soviet Union became the 'dictatorship of one man'.

A5.text: it would only be under Stalin that the Soviet Union became the 'dictatorship of one man'.
